Name: Rye Whiskey Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.5)
Ingredients: 25 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof /50% alc./vol.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon, orange & strawberry slices, mint sprig & borage.
Add a citrus slice and a couple of mint leaves from garnish
Review: Whisky works brilliantly in a fruit cup, arguably even better than gin. The spice and robustness of American rye whiskey adds a pleasing backbone to this long refreshing summery cocktail.
History: Created in June 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. For more recipes and history see Fruit Cups and Pimm's .
Nutrition: One serving of Rye Whiskey Fruit Cup (Difford's Cup No.5) contains 213 calories
